participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, she often reflects on her experiences and how they shape her understanding of herself.
participant_1.background: I started working at a convenience store until I found a new job in my field. I'm learning a lot about myself through my studies and my experiences in the water. To free my mind from feeling depressed, I look up at the stars at night. I need certain medications to live. My favorite place is the mountains.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Caring and adventurous, he values his relationships with family and seeks out new experiences.
participant_2.background: My siblings are my favorite people because they are always there for me and we have so much fun together. I sometimes forget to take care of myself because I am too busy. I work in retail. I traveled around the world in a boat. I like being by myself.

content.text: Pretty good! I'm excited to finish my work day and travel to see my siblings tomorrow.
Oh nice! That sounds like a lot of fun. I'm just working at a convenience store until I find a new job in my field.
Oh, that's cool! What field are you looking to work in?
I'm hoping to get a job in environmental science. I'm learning a lot about myself through my studies and my experiences in the water.
That's awesome! I'm glad you're excited about your field. I sometimes forget to take care of myself because I'm too busy working in retail.
Oh no! You should take some time for yourself. It's important to relax and de-stress.
I know, I know. I'll try to take some time for myself this weekend. How do you relax?
I like to go for walks in the mountains. It's so peaceful and beautiful up there.
That sounds amazing! I've always wanted to travel around the world by boat.
It's really fun! I got to see so many different cultures and meet new people.
That sounds like an incredible experience.
It was! I'm so glad I did it.
I'm sure you'll have some amazing experiences in your field of work too
